attributes.action: Change the powers of MPs, seek change in  the political and electoral system
attributes.additional_details: Leave or remain our voice is being pushed to aside our democratic procedures have been failed by the people we put trust to lead our country. Change needs to happen
attributes.background: After the recent abuse of powers of MPs and there ignorance to ignore a democratic vote the people need to take a stand against the people we voted for. We pay there wages yet the still ignore our opinion and will not uphold our votes to achieve there own agendas. It's about time our voice was heard

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. In particular we aren't sure what changes you'd like to make to the "powers of MP's" or the "political and electoral system"

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
